short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows hiding some of the side panels in Smartsheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tiny extension adds a couple check boxes to the Smartsheet web app so that you can hide the side panels that default to being visible and taking up valuable screen space. It uses something called localstorage to save the checked or unchecked state of the check boxes so when you return to the page it will remember how you had it set last.
